mutants.original_line: return ''.join(c.swapcase() if c.isalnum() else c for c in s)
mutants.mutated_line: return 'MUTATED'.join((c.swapcase() if c.isalnum() else c for c in s))

mutants.original_line: return ''.join(sorted([c.swapcase() for c in s], reverse=True))
mutants.mutated_line: return 'MUTATED'.join(sorted([c.swapcase() for c in s], reverse=True))

mutants.original_line: return ''.join(sorted([c.swapcase() for c in s], reverse=True))
mutants.mutated_line: return ''.join(sorted([c.swapcase() for c in s], reverse=False))
